modifier.forgedingears.aztec_knockback.d: Disables shields and pushes your enemies away.
material.forgedingears.match.flavor: Used to repair the match box, craft into repair kit for easier use. Match Sticks!
material.forgedingears.match.encyclopedi: Used to repair the match box, craft into repair kit for easier use. Match Sticks!
material.forgedingears.myrmex_resin.flav: Myrmex Resin is found in deserts and jungle biomes, fight the dangerous mobs to obtain this cool material!
material.forgedingears.myrmex_resin.ency: Myrmex Resin is found in deserts and jungle biomes, fight the dangerous mobs to obtain this cool material!
material.forgedingears.troll_leather.fla: Troll leather! Tough skin that doesn't allow arrows to penetrate it, a very useful material.
material.forgedingears.troll_leather.enc: Troll leather! Tough skin that doesn't allow arrows to penetrate it, a very useful material.
material.forgedingears.death_worm_chitin: Death Worm Chitin! Tough armor scales from the desert gods, very resistant to explosions.
Death Worm Chitin! Tough armor scales from the desert gods, very resistant to explosions.
modifier.forgedingears.tide_guardian.des: Makes you a god of the sea.
material.forgedingears.sea_serpent_scale: Sea Serpent Scales! Scales obtained when killing the dangerous sea monsters.
Sea Serpent Scales! Scales obtained when killing the dangerous sea monsters.
material.forgedingears.fire_dragon_scale: Fire Dragon Scales! Obtained by killing the dangerous fire breathing monsters.
Fire Dragon Scales! Obtained by killing the dangerous fire breathing monsters.
material.forgedingears.andesite_alloy.fl: Fused alloy between zinc and andesite, it's the best for the primitive age!
material.forgedingears.andesite_alloy.en: Fused alloy between zinc and andesite, it's the best for the primitive age!
This alloy is required for obtaining the next ore, copper!
material.forgedingears.duranite.flavor: A long time ago, meteorites fell from the sky. Friction heat and pressure formed duranite ore inside meteorites. Its natural form is very hard and you will need some time to break that ore.
material.forgedingears.duranite.encyclop: A long time ago, meteorites fell from the sky. Friction heat and pressure formed duranite ore inside meteorites. Its natural form is very hard and you will need some time to break that ore.
modifier.materialis.old_timer.descriptio: Repairing your tool is more expensive when your tool has high durability
material.forgedingears.uru.flavor: Legends say, that just the gods were able to melt down uru ore. Mystical weapons like Mjolnir were forged from this metal. It's found inside floating obsidioroid chunks.
material.forgedingears.uru.encyclopedia: Legends say, that just the gods were able to melt down uru ore. Mystical weapons like Mjolnir were forged from this metal. It's found inside floating obsidioroid chunks.
material.forgedingears.meteorite.flavor: You have to be patient to find meteorite in your world, they fell from the sky when the world was created, most of them are found underground.
material.forgedingears.meteorite.encyclo: You have to be patient to find meteorite in your world, they fell from the sky when the world was created, most of them are found underground.
material.forgedingears.obsidioroid.flavo: You have to be patient to find obsidioroid, they can be found in the end floating in the void, very dangerous.
material.forgedingears.obsidioroid.encyc: You have to be patient to find obsidioroid, they can be found in the end floating in the void, very dangerous.
material.forgedingears.jadarite.flavor: Radiation from the nether roof made this explosive material. BE CAREFUL!
material.forgedingears.jadarite.encyclop: Radiation from the nether roof made this explosive material. BE CAREFUL!
modifier.materialis.crystalline.descript: Adds 50% extra mining speed and attack damage
material.forgedingears.element_zero.flav: Sometimes the world is exposed to solar storms and strong magnetic fields, interacting with the bedrock layer above all that weight is created element zero, the densest metal in the world.
material.forgedingears.element_zero.ency: Sometimes the world is exposed to solar storms and strong magnetic fields, interacting with the bedrock layer above all that weight is created element zero, the densest metal in the world.
modifier.materialis.inertia.description: Decreases attack speed but increases attack damage
material.forgedingears.neutrum.flavor: Neutrum is a crystalline like metal found in the end. Its glow is caused by the strong radiation, careful when working with it.
material.forgedingears.neutrum.encyclope: Neutrum is a crystalline like metal found in the end. Its glow is caused by the strong radiation, careful when working with it.
modifier.materialis.nocturnal.descriptio: Gives bonus mining speed during the night, most powerful at midnight
modifier.forgedingears.nuclear_aura.desc: Applies radiation to mobs slowly killing them.
material.forgedingears.arcanium.flavor: Some scientists believe that arcanium ore emerges naturally, caused by heavy pressure and very high heat it has to absorb at the depth of the nether. It is believed to be radioactive.
material.forgedingears.arcanium.encyclop: Some scientists believe that arcanium ore emerges naturally, caused by heavy pressure and very high heat it has to absorb at the depth of the nether. It is believed to be radioactive.
modifier.materialis.arcane.description: Deals a small amount of extra magic damage to attacked targets
material.forgedingears.selenium.flavor: Selenium is very uncommon but you can find a lot of it, if you are patient enough. Cupid ore.
material.forgedingears.selenium.encyclop: Selenium is very uncommon but you can find a lot of it, if you are patient enough. Cupid ore.
modifier.forgedingears.loving.descriptio: Decreases your reach distance, but increases attack range.
material.forgedingears.valyrium.flavor: The old valyrian people were the first to discover this unique metal which they called valyrium. It is VERY rare and hard to find in the surrounding of the nether.
material.forgedingears.valyrium.encyclop: The old valyrian people were the first to discover this unique metal which they called valyrium. It is VERY rare and hard to find in the surrounding of the nether.
modifier.forgedingears.stealth_striker.d: Deal more damage if you hit an entity from the back.
modifier.forgedingears.netherbane.descri: Deal bonus damage to entities from the nether.
material.forgedingears.vibranium.flavor: Vibranium is the rare. Found in exotic biomes, where lightning dragons lie...
material.forgedingears.vibranium.encyclo: Vibranium is the rare. Found in exotic biomes, where lightning dragons lie...
modifier.materialis.auxiliary_power.desc: Boosts your attack speed based on your mining speed
modifier.materialis.supermassive.descrip: Greatly increases the amount of knockback dealt to enemies
modifier.materialis.work_hardened.descri: Your tool loses durability slower when it has low durability
material.forgedingears.solarium.flavor: Solarium is formed when combining valyrium and the immense light from lumix. The material of the sun.
material.forgedingears.solarium.encyclop: Solarium is formed when combining valyrium and the immense light from lumix. The material of the sun.
modifier.materialis.refueling.descriptio: Attacked mobs that are on fire will burn for longer
modifier.materialis.quenching.descriptio: Extinguishes mobs and deals bonus damage depending on how much longer the mob would have burned
material.forgedingears.adamantium.flavor: A virtually indestructible vibranium alloy named after the fabled metal Adamantine of Greek mythology.
material.forgedingears.adamantium.encycl: A virtually indestructible vibranium alloy named after the fabled metal Adamantine of Greek mythology.
material.forgedingears.uranium.flavor: Uranium is a radioactive alloy, even though it exists as an ore in the real world. Very useful alloy and needed for end-game.
material.forgedingears.uranium.encyclope: Uranium is a radioactive alloy, even though it exists as an ore in the real world. Very useful alloy and needed for end-game.
modifier.tconstruct.decay.description: Causes targets to wither away, but may also cause the holder to wither
modifier.materialis.decay.description: Your tool doesn't use durability on use but instead decays over time
material.forgedingears.amberlite.flavor: Amberlite is a crystalline slime which has unique overslime traits.
material.forgedingears.amberlite.encyclo: Amberlite is a crystalline slime which has unique overslime traits.
modifier.materialis.overeating.descripti: That overslime buffer on your tool suddenly looks very appealing
modifier.materialis.overweight.descripti: Eats some mining speed and attack damage to gain more overslime capacity
material.forgedingears.dionium.flavor: Dionium is a sythetic version of duranite, the recipe for it tries to recreate duranite but only to a certain degree.
material.forgedingears.dionium.encyclope: Dionium is a sythetic version of duranite, the recipe for it tries to recreate duranite but only to a certain degree.
material.forgedingears.lumix.flavor: Lumix, brightest alloy second to refined radiance. Let it glow!
material.forgedingears.lumix.encyclopedi: Lumix, brightest alloy second to refined radiance. Let it glow!
